lenders.name: Lila
lenders.occupation: Crisis Center for Mothers with Children
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an awesome vehicle to help people from all over the world help themselves! People who I would otherwise never have the opportunity to assist!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom who has the time to volunteer and I operate a center for homeless mothers and their children who are seeking self-sufficiency

lenders.name: janice
lenders.loan_because: It is better to give to all of GODS children..
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for car company, bulding heavy dudy trucks.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working toward economic independence for themselves and their families. Through KIVA I can help people no matter where they live in the World. What a great feeling!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Special Needs teacher. Now I spend a lot of my time taking care of my four grandsons, ages 7, 9, 11 and 14.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: Because I (just by luck)  was fortunate enought to be born to a loving/monetarily stable family in the United States.

lenders.name: Alberto
lenders.loan_because: Years ago I had a dream, so I asked my Dad for help and a little bit of magic to change my life. Today; I have what I asked for it.  Now is my turn to give it back to those in need. (My dad died 30 + yrs ago, and I'm still asking for his magic)
lenders.occupational_info: I support different programs within my company.

lenders.name: Candee
lenders.loan_because: When we are blessed with bounty, it is only right to share and help those in need,
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a short-term psychiatric hospital for children under 18.

lenders.name: Shankar
lenders.loan_because: I always wanted to help poor people who are need of help.This gives me happiness and a peaceful sleep.To see a happy face gives me more happiness and satisfaction.

lenders.name: Ismail Charania
lenders.loan_because: I like the way loan applicant pays back.
lenders.occupational_info: I would give something back to the people of third world, as a I belong to one.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: Even the smallest thing can change a life and ripple out to others.  I want to make that difference because so many have done so much for me in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have retired from paid work.  I now volunteer at a domestic violence agency, a Massachusetts conservation program and at a program caring for children in Romania.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: what goes around comes around.  Pass it forward.

lenders.name: Carlee
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone make a better life for themselves.  We all need help sometime in our life, that is why God gave us each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I help, encourage, and support my husband and am dedicated to raising my children in a way that honors the Lord.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: someday I may need to ask for assistance
lenders.occupational_info: for my living, I qualitiy check computer monitoring software; for myself, I create metal jewelry and objects

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: Because being a single mother there are alot of hardships but I do understand that by giving God rewards and blesses the little you have.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful oppertunity to help others attain a better life.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: Loaning through KIVA is like planting seeds all over the world.  By coming together to make loans we become like a forest rather than an individual tree.
lenders.occupational_info: Taught mentally retared children.  Now retired, enjoy travel, long walks, reading, fishing, meeting new people, finding ways to help others.

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: someone else needs my $25 more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to try to make things look nice, whether it's a brochure, a website or a canvas.

lenders.name: Tonya
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to others outside of the US.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach computers and business to 14-18 year old students.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women in foreign countries become self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: Just lending a helping hand to other women.

lenders.name: Marie, James & Allie
lenders.loan_because: We love helping people improve their own lives through owning their own business
lenders.occupational_info: Marie helps people save for their retirement and James is a manager for a retail hardware store. Allie is a high school student

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: it is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: rehabilitation nursing for spinal cord injured people.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic idea. What a great way to help others. Everyone should do this!

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: These folks deserve a hand up& I am grateful to be able to help them get there [I once struggled too!]. Its the right thing to do..bless them all!
lenders.occupational_info: My proudest achievement is raising my 2 wonderful children into compassionate,honest & productive adults.I live with my husband& many rescued dogs&cats.I enjoy reading,cooking,knitting&crafts,&make money with occasional translations.

lenders.name: WAYNE
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me & my family and I feel it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I had to take early retirement due to illness

lenders.name: Ginger
lenders.loan_because: You need it and you are worthy. I believe it to be my responsibility to help others in their time of need. If I was not helped, I would not be able to return the favor now.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people cover the risks they face and help them plan for their future.

lenders.name: Colin, MIchelle, and Cole
lenders.occupation: parents teaching a child the importance of giving

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone else and Kiva is a great organization!

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: I feel that even though I cant do much, by helping one person it can make a difference for them and for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a representitive for a ski apparel company, I deal with retail shops directly to distribute our clothing line and help teach the sales associates about the products.

lenders.name: Delores
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and enjoy helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people pay their traditional home mortgage in 1/2 the time or less with a special software package I sell.

lenders.name: Cindi
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my own life.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: We all should be of service to each other. It warms my heart to help those in need. Especially those who are trying so hard and just need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have been a Fine Art - Documentary
Photographer for 28 yrs. I have been an Entreprenur as well since 1993

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Renaissance literature

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that my money is being put to good use, and that the entrepreneurs' lives who receive these loans are bettered by it. I think it is cool how they don't just receive money, which takes no effort on their part, but they are simply given a starting hand; it is up to them where to go with it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: It's a privilege to share, and it's exciting to help a business grow!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist faculty members with academic leaves and with travel grants to present their research at conferences.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to help - you never lose! and so much is gained.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find information on anything they need--finding jobs, finding recreational reading, finding names for their babies, and much much more.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good. We are here to help others.  These gifts make an impact on someone's life. Pay it forward!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in the Financial Services industry

lenders.name: Gilbert
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this idea.
lenders.occupational_info: Engage in SAP utility industry projects

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard you have to work to survive. I don't have much, no one has ever helped me, but I want to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: My sewing is my life. I make very well made, affordable doll clothes, each a one of a kind.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the helping spirit of women, who willingly lend a hand, heart, or whatever is needed to their sisters, wherever they might live across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the mental health profession. In private practice for over 25 years, I treated individuals, couples, and families, hoping to guide them to happier and more productive paths in their relationships and in their lives in general.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I  hope I can share some wealth with deserving people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Autistic children and help them learn to live somewhat independently in this world.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world and do what I can to help make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Working in the Arts..producing art shows, promoting artists.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: This is in memory of the most wonderful dad in the world.  I love you and miss you.

lenders.name: Vivian
lenders.loan_because: I respect hard work and it makes me happy to give someone an opportunity to help themselves, their family and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office and provide assistance to employees of my company who have questions about their benefits.

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: It is a blessing to sow seeds.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: it is a wonderful opportunity to help someone help themselves, and it is incredibly affordable.  I love the feeling I could help!
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to be retired and I entertain myself watching my grandchildren and reading and doing needlework.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee the operations of a preschool. I am fortunate to have the opportunity to make a difference in the lives of young children every day.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: we all deserve a chance to better ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities find work. And at night I work in a coffee shop.

lenders.name: Nick & Monik
lenders.loan_because: if you can help someone, why not do it?
lenders.occupational_info: We are French Canadians,Nick is a College Professor.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it's fun.
lenders.occupational_info: i am studying to become a doctor.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and in this small way maybe I can help someone else have a better life.

lenders.name: terese
lenders.loan_because: I believe in hard work and independence and helping people help themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for children ages 3-12 in a very large, predominately poor suburban elementary school

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: because i enjoy goiving more than i take.
lenders.occupational_info: well i don't work because i'm only in the 9th grade. i'm not old enough to work just yet. but i'm doing this because i'm doing fundraising.

lenders.name: Michael F. Deschenes
lenders.occupation: Pre-Cast Quality Control + Handcraft Wire Jewelry
lenders.loan_because: The possibilities of that person that I make a loan to may succeed enough to allow him or her to loan to someone less fortunate than themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: During the day I inspect concrete products like manholes, bridges,box culverts. During the evening i handcraft wire jewelry from14kt rolled gold for my home based business.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: If we live in gratitude by giving freely and from the heart, we will receive the same.

lenders.name: alan
lenders.loan_because:
We're all brothers and sisters...

My favorite quote...

"A whisper can be stronger, as an atom is stronger, than a whole mountain." 
Louise Nevelson
lenders.occupational_info: My job is incredibly fun, and I'm very grateful for the ability and outlet.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I admire these people that work so hard to make a living for their family.  I feel blessed to be able to directly contribute to their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of premature and very sick newborn babies.

lenders.name: memory of Gandenla
lenders.loan_because: people helping people get a start towards their dreams is the best feeling in the world!

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others out
lenders.occupational_info: Deliver mail to the people  for the Postal Service.

lenders.name: ghaiss
lenders.loan_because: it's the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer, but I manufacture wood seating for wholesale.

lenders.name: True
lenders.loan_because:
I have been a single mom for much of my adult life, raising two sons on my own. I was very much an entrepeneur--making jewelry, doing graphic design, sewing, whatever I could do--to feed my kids. 

I want to help other mothers to get on their feet. I am grateful to have the opportunity to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I design books, websites, CDs. I also make jewelry.

lenders.name: Lynn and Craig
lenders.occupation: Lead Teacher Primrose School So. Tampa
lenders.loan_because: When I help anyone I feel on top of the world.  Not only am I helping make a difference in this world, I am also making a difference in my life!
lenders.occupational_info: I have a school for children ages 3 - 5 and also take care of children ages 6 weeks - 3 years.  Best job in the world!!!

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It is a good feeling to help someone for so little.  God has blessed me, therefore I believe each person should a chance to live a better life for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from Healthcare Industry.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I was there and someone helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: Being the best wife, friend, neighbor, mom, tutu, great-tutu & person I can be.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Samiyah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in doing unto others, as I would have them do unto me.  I loan because I believe every  person on this planet has a purpose and that it is our duty as human beings to assist each other in achieving our purpose.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist. I get to feel for the world, I get to entertain the world.

lenders.name: Superiorgal
lenders.loan_because: It is an opportunity to give back a small portion of all our abundance!  There is great joy in being able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am comitted to my family and spend my days overseeing the affairs of my household.  I also am privileged to teach my two children at home.  This is my contribution to the future---to train up this young generation in the way they should go!  They are the leaders of tomorrow.

lenders.name: michelle
lenders.loan_because: I desire to empower women all over the world. Plus, it's so darn fun!

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being involved in making this world become a better place to live

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because:
this is a great way to learn geography and economics
and become attached to the people of the earth. A 
family could do this together and change their
children's perspective towards others.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to offer a "hand up" over simply a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: My hobby is my work... I collect postage stamps, and sell the extra ones on eBay.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Jon & Shantel
lenders.loan_because: We have had many blessings in our lives and we give because it is rewarding to see how someone’s life can be improved with very little.  It makes us happy to know we are helping make a difference.

lenders.name: Les Drake
lenders.loan_because: I believe small groups of people build economically strong communities, rather than large institutions who are not  accountable to the community.
lenders.occupational_info: heath care data analysis

lenders.name: Azucena
lenders.loan_because: i want to start my own business.

lenders.name: Len & Pat
lenders.loan_because: are you kidding.  this is great....
lenders.occupational_info: tax and travel why not help someone

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I have been so blessed in my life I feel compelled to share my blessings. As Mother Theresa says "Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work."
lenders.occupational_info: An RN is a nurse that has completed a course of study and passed the proper examinations to become licensed and registered.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: It feels good!  And I have seen how small things can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I talk on the radio.  Really.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because:
(1) It is always time to give back. 
(2) The stories remind me of people I've met and known along this glorious journey called life.
lenders.occupational_info: I know what it's like to need just a little more money to make your dreams come true. I have been inspired by others' profound generosity to me in my times of need. Between 2002 and 2007, $100 would change my life dramatically; now I can only hope that it can do some good for others.

lenders.name: Tristan
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility to use what I have been given to help others.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I am finally in a position to help someone else. I believe in pay it forward...
lenders.occupational_info: I make people's pets look and feel better.Being in an animal hospital,I have alot of clients that are older and in bad health,so I try to make them feel better by being clean and looking good.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone life!!!

lenders.name: Laraine
lenders.loan_because: We need to all support each other throughout the world. We are all human beings and we all deserve a chance. And this is a small way I can help to be part of the solution, not the problem.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in an emergency room in a big city. We take care of the very rich and very poor. I love to make a difference in people's lives with excellent patient care.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: We all need to do whatever we can in whatever way we can to help each other. A loan like these are easy, the people we loan to probably help others in may other ways. We all do what we can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I love photography and manipulating images using a computer. I love capturing images of people, nature, scenics.  The view in a big city like this is very limited, yet all around us is the art of nature in every tree, flower, mountain, sky and face.  I love trying to capture a glimpse of that art and beauty with a camera.

lenders.name: Cooper
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the 2nd grade.  I love school.  I love math and reading.  I like to help other children.  I also like to save my money.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.occupation: Public School Teacher and single mother of 2 girls

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: we are blessed and would like to extend a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep tally of where money is being earned and spent.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I think we should help one another when we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school every weekday from 9 am to 2:40 pm and take 6 classes: English, Spanish, Math, US History, Environmental Science and a course on Modern Africa.

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because:
I came a long way from being in a battered women's shelter with an eight year old son.
I like to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a home that I am sharing with 6 persons in need of care.

lenders.name: Susan & family
lenders.loan_because: I hope it will give someone the ability to provide for themself through a successful business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Director of a recreational facility for senior adults over the age of 55.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I got my biz going because of help, so its only right I pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: I produce straight to video documentaries and now I'm producing TV shows. Google "JayGee Ent. Jason)

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I'm tired of feeling like a hypocrite who always says "we really should help people in need more".  I've decided it's time to do something however small it may be.
lenders.occupational_info: I do rehabilitation and phyical therapy at an orthopaedic surgeon's office

lenders.name: Nilanjana
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes this simple.

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: I can.  At this time in my life, it selfishly makes me feel good to give.  I love Mexico and visit there often.  I look around at the opulence of the resorts, then at the homes of the real Mexican people and think -- how can I give back other than spending tourist dollars.  Thanks to Kiva, Oprah and President Clinton for making me aware of this website!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with hospitals implementing new computer systems, or upgrading their current ones.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people!

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone with a hand up not a hand out.  These people seem to want to try to make a better life for themselves and I want to help them do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I determine the value of property so that lenders can decide how much to loan an investor to buy the property.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because:
Good goes around.
As a small business owner, I know the value of a loan. Thank you Kiva for making it easy to make a difference in this world!
lenders.occupational_info: Besides travel, my husband and I are manufacturers of scones, shortbread and biscuits. We turned our dream into a reality and are pleased to partner with other budding entrepreneurs around the world.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: As a retired entrepreneur who was a single mother to 3 children, I know first hand how difficult it is at times. I hope that my small contribution will help another deserving woman reach the success that I did, both professionally & in raising my children who became very successful and happy adults. I am now at a time in my life to give back...Hopefully I will set an example to others. What a privilege this is! God Bless you women!
lenders.occupational_info: Before I retired, I put myself through college at night while working a full time job and raising 3 children. I was an Accountant who always had another type of endeavor going at the same time; ranging from  selling cosmetics door to door; to owning a house cleaning business; to owning my own Accounting Firm. I had to work very hard and made many sacrifices to get where I am today.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: Why not!  If I can help in any way, then I will.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help others.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: It is gratifying to see these business people working hard to help themselves.  I am very happy to be a part of an endeavor by someone who wants to help themselves with a ligitimate business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but work part-time from home as a comptroller for a small firm that investigates death claims for insurance companies.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It is my hope that everyone can feel the power & joy of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I mentor, motivate and look for jobs for other people.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at home caring for my daughter.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who do not have the opportunities that we have in the United States.  I respect their hard work.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: it helps people who want to help themselves.  To be self-sufficient is empowering.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I admire and identify with a woman who is overcoming challenges in her life and does so by way of fabric and thread.
lenders.occupational_info: My interest is in english smocking, quilting and bobbin lace.

lenders.name: Krissy
lenders.loan_because: I take for granted every day what I have and how fortunate I am. I would like to give something back
lenders.occupational_info: I make loans for a living...but it's not as rewarding as this

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: Helping can be overwhelming and this site makes it so easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an actress in LA on TV and films.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I loan because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Software development and photography.

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because:
It's important to lend a helping hand and by doing so it makes the world a better place.

“The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.” 
   -- Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: Rajvee & Peter
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone on Earth is related. Humans are dependent on our one planet, Earth. We need to work together to achieve bigger goals. Communities can be built through these businesses.

A human being has a wide range of potentials and life possibilities. If we want to live in peace and protect the earth for the future we need to recognize that human desperation is a threat to all of humanity. We should try to build a world where humans do not have to live in desperate situations because the power of the human mind and collective effort can sustain the whole world's population.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Ecuador for two months which changed my whole perspective on life.  If I can give $25 to help change someone's life there, then that is money well spent.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.occupation: Retired - mother of three, grandmother of five

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world :)

lenders.name: The Nootenboom Family
lenders.occupation: Compliance Consultant, Rx Tech, Elem. Students
lenders.loan_because: This is an educational opportunity for our children to learn about helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Shai - focusing on 7th grade studies, aspires to attend NYU or Stanford (today at least). Jamie - 5th grade gymnast.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Matthew 25:40
lenders.occupational_info: I run a  large, all volunteer, food pantry. We provide groceries with recipes for complete meals to the needy. We also offer information regarding the many other sources of assistance available for individual needs. Our goal is, to help people help themselves and  get back on their feet. We make free Bibles, Christian literature, and sermon tapes  available to all. Our ministry is solely church supported.

lenders.name: Tanner & Maddie
lenders.loan_because: The little we donate can help change someones live.  "A little can do a lot"
lenders.occupational_info: Custom Vinyl Lettering & Designs to help advertise businesses

lenders.name: Micaela
lenders.loan_because: I beleive you need a chance in order to have success in whatever you do.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small Dog Grooming business in Houston, Tx.

lenders.name: Preston
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I can...because changing the world happens in small, but collective steps...because we are global citizens with the power to help each other...because I am inspired by the developers of this website and the individual entrepreneurs it represents...because it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach "Women's Studies" at university.  Through this work I like to think I empower my students while also encouraging them to consider their own privilege and responsibilities as global citizens.

lenders.name: Sepehr
lenders.loan_because: Coming from a third world country, I know how lucky I am to be in America.  Plus, I know the money can benefit the recipient more than me. =D

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: life is all about helping each other

lenders.name: Mindy
lenders.loan_because:
Those who give love gather love, and
I love to help those in need.

lenders.name: Bridgette
lenders.loan_because: The Lord loves a cheerful giver.  I hope and pray that my son, Robert, will never have a need, such as food and shelter, but if he ever does, I pray that my kindness to others will cause blessings to fall on him and someone will be kind to him.
lenders.occupational_info: For the past 5 years I have been involved with the Shashamane Foundation, a 501(c)3 non-profit organization.  We have built a school in Ethiopia that now houses 600 students.  Each year we put on a fashion show to raise money to assist the school.  We have also created a magazine called AFAR, which I am the creative designer and editor.  The magazine sales help to fund the school in Africa.

lenders.name: Ateeya
lenders.loan_because: it reminds me that one person can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I provide businesses with  risk management advice and insurance product placement

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I lead a very privileged life compared to much of the world and I want to help other people who are trying to make a decent life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired high school teacher and I am now working as a real estate assistant.

lenders.name: Isaac
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the ability to earn a good living.  If i'm able to give someone a chance to better themselves then i will.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an IT Consultant.  I configure and maintain Computer Networks for a wide variety of companies.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people in the agricultural industry around the world. Everyone deserves a chance to help themselves and their families prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I help cattle producers in Alberta, Canada to do better in their businesses.

lenders.name: Suzanne,Carol and Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I had recently watched a documentary on micro loans and I was so impresssed at what these organizations were doing but I didn't know how to donate to one.  Then one day my girls and myself were watching the Oprah show and found out about Kiva, we immediately went to the web site to find someone to help.  My girls are so excited about the idea of doing the important job of helping someone feed their family my oldest has a birthday coming up and she donated her birthday money to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Students and a teacher

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back. As a person who started his own business I understand the importance of funding/risk model. We all ha ve our dreams and we need partners to accomplish them.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a consulting company. We specialize in helping high tech firms grow there business  thru, building, fixing, coaching and providing winning sales strategies for Sales Teams.

lenders.name: Joachim
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build the Internet.

lenders.name: On the Farm Vegetables
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Ramona and Ruwan
lenders.loan_because: We believe that this is one of the best ways to alleviate poverty and change the world - one family at a time.

lenders.name: Eddie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we can all make a difference in the life of someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I deal with a variety of people and work for a company that believes in taking care of the world as well as in the value in helping others.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist in the areas devastated by US policies
lenders.occupational_info: Even though I have retired, I continue to work part-time.  I web enable curriculum for migrant high school students

lenders.name: Jeanne (Amenlady)
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said to give... "Freely you have received, freely give."  I am so thankful for this excellent idea to help people whom are working to make their own lives better, often in places where that is difficult.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife for 36 years, mother of 5 childen, grandmother to 11. I have worked various jobs including customer service, Hair cutting and medical dispatcher for emergency medical heart teams. Currently I just serve my family at home and serve the Lord Jesus Christ through my church.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: It matters.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that the people's bills are correct, help them with questions about their bills, and make sure they pay them.

lenders.name: KENEDY,LIZ & BABY FLORA
lenders.loan_because: its a blessing to share

lenders.name: V.T.
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people become self-sufficient.   This program focuses on the proverbial act of teaching people to fish, rather than serving them a meal.
lenders.occupational_info: Lead the Americas division of a large, global corporation.

lenders.name: Devlin
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people get on their feet in a developing country.

lenders.name: Mahesh
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in this world and want to be able to give back and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of computers at a local university

lenders.name: yashoda Gowda
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone needs a chance to find their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy, sell or rent homes.

lenders.name: Isa
lenders.loan_because: at some point, someone stood up for me. I could never pay them back, so I will pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I  train people to use computers and create web sites.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I belileve that individuals are the keys to their own success.
lenders.occupational_info: Work in technology and volunteer to organizations in my community.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it can be to start and run a business.  I hope that my success can help others around the world achieve the same satisfaction I feel at a job well done.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to make a loan after I saw Oprah's program about giving.  I am a big believer in giving to developing countries.  In the U.S. we have so much more, and we can give a little to help others "learn how to fish".  I like giving to people who are willing to work hard.  I especially was interested in loaning to someone in Ecuador because I lived in Quito for a year.  I remember flying into Guayaquil on the way to visit the Galapogas Islands.  I want to contine to make loans every month.
lenders.occupational_info:
I teach seven-eight year olds.  We focus mostly on reading and math.
I've been teaching for 25 years and I love it.

lenders.name: Sandi
lenders.loan_because: I beleive if everyone gave just what they could afford this entire world would be a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but I am part owner and investor in a business my son runs.  It is the limo business.  We have 4 limos 2 are racing themed.  We are doing so well and just want to help someone get started in their own business.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in so many ways.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.occupational_info: commercial real estate

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to teach my daughter that there are better, unselfish ways to treat people in our vast world.

lenders.name: wendy
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner and have been blessed with the resources and opportunities to make my own life better and want to give others those same opportunities.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I think it is an awesome idea that such a small thing for me means such a great thing for someone else!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant manager for a big box retailer. I manage our apparel, home decor, and home "essentials" departments.

lenders.name: Matty
lenders.loan_because: Women need to become more independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at home doing computer and Internet research.  I happen to not be working at the present time.

lenders.name: stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all must do what we can. I am fortunate to live where I do and to do what I do...so I help where I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make money with my voice:)

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.occupational_info: I am a second year PhD student in European history and work part-time in administration at Harvard University.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a very busy real estate law office.  We help people buying and selling their homes; setting up new businesses, etc.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to give back for all the blessings I've had in my life.

lenders.name: allison
lenders.loan_because: each small stream becomes a river, and this gives life and possibilities.

lenders.name: Erika, Mo and Zia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can make a difference no matter how small a contribution. Lending a hand to a stranger makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I have learned in life that "what goes around, comes around".

lenders.name: Romeo
lenders.loan_because: I want to provide people the tools they need to get ahead in their life so they in turn can help their family and community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor.

lenders.name: MHarrin
lenders.loan_because: Kiva offers a way for people to reach around the world and give someone else a hand up.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand now and then
lenders.occupational_info: Real Estate

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: It feels great ...

lenders.name: sue
lenders.loan_because: To help end poverty across the world.  Sharing the blessings we have been given.  It feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: I inspect airplane parts for Boeing airplanes

lenders.name: Annika
lenders.loan_because: I can.....because this can change someones WHOLE life and I love to help people and make a difference!!! Oh,  and it makes me smile!

lenders.name: Merrick & Karen
lenders.loan_because: Oprah told me to.

lenders.name: maria
lenders.loan_because: "Helping other is the greatest gift"

lenders.name: edward
lenders.loan_because: I can, and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: retail mgr

lenders.name: Daren and Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: karyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to lend a hand up to those trying hard to provide for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Kathy J
lenders.occupation: Natural Resource Specialist - US Forest Service
lenders.loan_because:
Its a way to "pay it forward."  
I've been blessed with friends and family who have supported me when I needed it.  This is an opportunity to help others realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Sandi & Children
lenders.loan_because: some wonderful people helped me when I was homeless and I just want to give a little back in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the computer all day long communicating with people all over the world.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: To inspire, to help and to make the world better. One small helping hand can lead to so many more.
lenders.occupational_info: Getting product to store so it can be sold.

lenders.name: Marcy
lenders.loan_because: this is a fantastic concept that allows so many people to make a difference in the lives of others so far away and I wanted to be a part of something so good.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: Of need
lenders.occupational_info: Raising my 15 year old granddaughter

lenders.name: Edward and Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people that desire the independance of owning their own business, and to make a better life for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a small business ourselves, in the construction industry.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: We all live in the same world, we all deserve to work to improve our lives. I give because there are people in need that deserve the same chance as everyone else in the world to have a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office helping my company to develop new scientific technology the help improve the world.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel all over the world demonstrating software for airlines.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I want the people who are trying to make a difference in their lives to have the support to get them there.
lenders.occupational_info: I graduated from University a year ago and I now work for our energy utility company in the accounting department. My dream is to become an entrepreneur one day...but for now I am happy to support other people who are working towards their dreams.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I care about people trying to succed and know they will pass on their gifts to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Cargill, a world wide company. I trade commodities

lenders.name: Aidan J.
lenders.loan_because: I like helpin people!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in 7th grade

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: Everybody does better when EVERYBODY does better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a college. In my free time, I enjoy learning U.S. history, camping, traveling with friends and taking photos.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: helping others is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.loan_because: I've been poorer and I could have used help, I'm so over joyed I can do this little bit for someone to prosper and have a better life!  I do it with love.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help others heal, emotionally, physically and spiritually.  In return I am helped and heal emotinally, physically and spiritually.

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: I want people to succeed, to grow and learn from each other.  I support hard work and creativity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help take care of elders in a long term care home who have health concerns that pevent them or their families from caring for themselves.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: as John Donne wrote, no man is an island, and so, those who have been blessed have a moral imperative to help others

lenders.name: Denise Miranda
lenders.loan_because: it helps make someone's load a little lighter.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to impact the future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with educators to improve student achievement for each and every child.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: It feels so GOOD!  As a Realtor, I'm a small entrepeneur myself.  How cool to be able to know what another small business person is going through and that I'm doing my small part to contribute to their success.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find a home to buy and I help people find someone to buy their home when they need to sell it.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an investment in humanity.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm helping to find medicine for diseases.

lenders.name: Akiko
lenders.occupation: Mom, Fiber Artist, Int'l Development Consultant
lenders.loan_because: I was born and raised in a developing country and strongly believe in the power of being able to empower someone and make a difference directly in that person's life and the life of his/her family!
lenders.occupational_info:
I care and raise my 2 years old son, Nicolas. I used to work in international development before becoming a Mom, and know first hand the importance and impact that microfinance can have for a small entrepreneur.
I am also a fiber artist, a yogini, an amateur web designer and a freelance photographer.

lenders.name: Wil
lenders.loan_because: It makes you feel good.

lenders.name: Jeff & Mary
lenders.loan_because: "Give me a fish and I eat for a day. Teach me to fish and I eat for a lifetime.”

lenders.name: Gail & Bruce
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I want to meet and help others in different countries in a practical way.  It helps me feel connected in a more personal way to people in need.

lenders.name: Peter and Leah
lenders.loan_because:
John F Kennedy once said :
If not us, Who?
If not now, When?
Pass along your blessings and see how the world can change ~

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to give a hand up over a hand out. I LOVE Kiva!

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: To borrow a friend's favorite quote, "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." -- Winston Churchill
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of children with kidney diseases.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: janie
lenders.loan_because: it might make a differance to someone and it makes me feel good about myself

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We all need a hand from time to time.  Getting started or continuing to grow a business isn't always easy, this might help someone to "make it" in their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a retail online business where I sell mainly crafting supplies.  I enjoy crafts and enjoy building websites too!

lenders.name: Paul & Lora
lenders.loan_because:
We have the means to and were once in the same position as many of these borrowers.

We truly believe that given the chance, anyone can accomplish anything!
lenders.occupational_info: Paul is a manager with an oilfield services company and Lora is an interior designer.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: We often ask, "what would Jesus do?"  I know he would be pleased with this!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse in a Veteran's hospital. There are 49 veterans on my unit and I make sure they recieve the best care. The whole facility is the largest in my state where I live and holds almost 600 veterans. I have a son and daughter and two grandchildren whom I cherish dearly.

lenders.name: dave
lenders.loan_because:
i love to help people who help their 
self
love to see people get ahead in life
lenders.occupational_info: i love my work  it is taking care of my grand babys

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: To help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing help to passengers on airplanes

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me when I needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of children after school so their parents can work.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone occasionally needs a helping hand, and I am so happy that I am able to participate in this great program..

lenders.name: SANDI STOKES
lenders.loan_because: I like to lend a helping hand to others.

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple way to make a difference in other parts of the world.  I like choosing who the money goes to and knowing they might realize their dreams as they get what they need to improve their lives. Many people have invested in me over the years...investing in others is a good habit.

lenders.name: Cassie Shuford
lenders.occupation: Account Representative for a Non-Profit Organizati
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am able. Because I believe it is important to do so and is part of my spirit! Helping others to help themselves is core of everything good.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell mathematics software to school systems who are working with students who do not read well or understand all the terms in Mathematics but would learn Math if explained without language as a barrier using spatial-temporal approach( visual) instead of terminology and formulas

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: I like to help
lenders.occupational_info: business process analyst

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: ... people working together to help other people....  so simple & yet so effective. How can I not?

lenders.occupational_info: It's good to be in a position where I can help

lenders.name: Terri & Bear

lenders.name: Dina

lenders.name: Ann

lenders.name: Brenda

lenders.occupational_info: I am just someone trying to help make a difference. No different then countless others doing the same thing.

lenders.name: Kristine

lenders.name: Tammy
